timeline.message:
Add Alert reference field

Add new alertRef field to alerts.
This is to allow us to tell the difference between different alerts
raised by the same rule. By default is will be the plugin id - rules
will need to be changed to append a qualifier for each of the alerts
they raise.

Signed-off-by: Simon Bennetts <psiinon@gmail.com>

timeline.body:
```suggestion
     * one type of alert and they should all have different alert references.
```

timeline.body: Should we also update the core reporting? (Or separate issue/PR?)

replies.bodyText: Doh, forgot about those, will add to this PR...

replies.bodyText: Ha! No need - they now call the alert API endpoints so they dont need to change.
replies.author: psiinon

timeline.message:
Add Alert reference field

Add new alertRef field to alerts.
This is to allow us to tell the difference between different alerts
raised by the same rule. By default is will be the plugin id - rules
will need to be changed to append a qualifier for each of the alerts
they raise.

Signed-off-by: Simon Bennetts <psiinon@gmail.com>
